reviewText: Very helpful for basic steps, which is what I needed, however it became a bit too complicated about two-thirds through. I would have enjoyed a slower build up of combinations.
to be honest,this dvd is ok but not long enough,also didn't really learn anything new so a bit disappointed about it

Finis Jhung is very good at explaining what he wants from his student. It a good substiute when can get to a class. I have a friend that studied with Finis Jhung for years. She said she enjoyed his combinations moving across the floor his classes were great. I highly recommend that dancer studing ballet get this CD.
